import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState(null);const[summary,setSummary]=useState('');const handleFileChange=event=>{setSelectedFile(event.target.files[0]);};const handleUpload=()=>{if(!selectedFile){alert('Please select a file first.');return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',selectedFile);axios.post('http://localhost:5000/upload',formData).then(response=>{const{summary}=response.data;setSummary(summary);// Update state with summary text
